hopobject.body:
April 2016 Dog Dish

from the foundation
Congratulations to the winners of BeagleBone Green IoT contest on Hackster.io:
  1. Chris Earley created the Haptic Cape as a safe way to get started with Haptic Neuroprosthesis
  2. Simon Werner made a sailing machine controlled via GSM cell link
  3. Mirko Denecke developed a state-of-the-art Linux autopilot cape.
    — Christine Long, Executive Director
news

Google Summer of Code students selected

BeagleBoard.org has selected 7 students for Google Summer of Code. Projects include: BeagleScope, Beaglebone Blue API, bone101 improvements, PRU as I2C/SPI/UART device, low-latency audio, and more!
Read more »

LabVIEW Physical Computing Kit for BeagleBone Black

Connect LabVIEW projects to the physical world. Kit includes BeagleBone Black and LabVIEW Home Bundle

Read more »

Winning BeagleBone Green Projects

Winning projects of the BeagleBone Green IoT contest on Hackster.io: Haptic Cape for Neurohacking, RC Sailing Machine, and Flying BeagleBone Green

Read more »

events

Penguicon: April 29 - May 1
Southfield, Michigan. Non-profit, community-run convention for open source software and hardware, science fiction, gaming, DIY, and more

Maker Faire Bay Area: May 21 - May 22
San Mateo, California. 11th Annual!


community topics

SanCloud BeagleBone Enhanced campaign

Only 10 days left to back the SanCloud BeagleBone Enhanced on Indiegogo

Necitec CNC Cape

Up to 4-axis CNC cape for BeagleBone Black. Controlled by MachineKit.

BeagleBone Alexa Client

Mike Erdahl turned his BeagleBone into an Amazon Alexa Client.

Kernel build tip

John Syne pointed out how to skip menuconfig when rebuilding bb-kernel


hot off the presses

Bad to the Bone, 2nd Edition
by Steven F. Barrett & Jason Kridner

featured projects

In-Out Weather Station

Carmelito Andrade used the BeagleBone Green to display Temperature & Humidity inside and outside of his home.
More Details »
BeagleFlow

A classic toaster reflow oven built around the BeagleBone green. Easy to tweak due to the Python based contoller with Web UI.
More Details »

Myo Controlled Bike Lights

Tisham Dhar created a muscle and motion sensor controlled bike turn and stop signalling system for safe riding at night.
More Details »

Three Story Tall Clock

Bring a building-sized digital clock to life using 129,600 independent RGB LEDs controlled by 72 BeagleBone Greens.

More Details »
